com.seamless.ers.interfaces.external.data
Class PaymentInvoiceRow

java.lang.Object
  com.seamless.ers.interfaces.external.data.PaymentInvoiceRow
Deprecated. This class is only used in Invoice but has been superseded by ERSWSExternalClientService.submitPaymentReceipt(ClientContext, String, ReceiptDocument) . 

public class PaymentInvoiceRow
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a row in the invoice.
